function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sparse and noisy data for estimating transmission rates","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of transmission rates and epidemic dynamics","Mitigation":"Use smoothing techniques to reduce noise and uncertainty in the data before estimation","Technologies":"Smoothing algorithms, Kalman filter approach","People":"Epidemiologists, data scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Unknown parametric form of transmission rates","Impact":"Difficulty in modeling and estimating transmission rates accurately","Mitigation":"Utilize flexible modeling approaches that can adapt to different parametric forms","Technologies":"Adaptive modeling techniques, Kalman filter approach","People":"Epidemiologists, mathematicians","Owner":"Research institutions, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Association of NPIs with epidemic dynamics has never been formally studied using French data","Impact":"Lack of understanding the impact of NPIs on epidemic dynamics in the French population","Mitigation":"Conduct formal studies to analyze the relationship between NPIs and epidemic dynamics","Technologies":"Statistical analysis, data modeling, Kalman filter approach","People":"Epidemiologists, public health researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
